data.name: Masters of Puzzle - Byodoin Reflection
data.detailed_description:
We are happy to introduce another great photography by King Wong, that captures the Byodoin temple in a magnificent way. The almost perfect reflection of it in the lake makes this a very interesting composition and the perfect challenge for our puzzle masters.


Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle playable in variations of 250, 500, 750, 1000, 1500, 2000, and 2500 puzzle tiles. This is going to be a very unique challenge first because of the reflection and second because of the intricate architecture of the temple itself. We hope you'll have many fun hours trying to assemble it.
data.about_the_game:
We are happy to introduce another great photography by King Wong, that captures the Byodoin temple in a magnificent way. The almost perfect reflection of it in the lake makes this a very interesting composition and the perfect challenge for our puzzle masters.

data.short_description: A photography puzzle box for the Masters of Puzzle game.
data.supported_languages: English, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, German, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Min requirements might be subject of a change

  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Quad Core

  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requirements might be subject of a change
